Articles.Content: Are the launch a satellite with line of sight of <insert site> here contracts still around? I haven't seen one during my most recent round of play.
Which version are you in? I'm in 1.2 and I think I got a contract like that once...

Yes, but the term "line of sight" was considered to be misleading, so it was changed to "directly above" instead. And only 3-star satellite contracts can be for "stationary satellites". If a 3 star satellite contract gets generated, there is about a 33% chance (IIRC) that it will be stationary.
